Class Team

java.lang.Object
  Team

public abstract class Team
extends java.lang.Object

Team class

Concrete classes that extent Team must define their own concrete classes to extend Piece.

Concrete classes must override generate. Concrete classes must override doStuff.

protected  java.awt.Color color
          Team color Used in map graphics.

          Team flag Origin point for all new Pieces.
protected  java.lang.Integer[] memory
          Team memory array Used to store information for use by the team.

          Name of team

Field Detail

color

protected java.awt.Color color
Team color Used in map graphics.

flag

protected Flag flag
Team flag Origin point for all new Pieces. Goal for enemy Pieces.

memory

protected final java.lang.Integer[] memory
Team memory array Used to store information for use by the team. Length is 10 and cannot be changed by concrete classes that inherit from Team

name

protected java.lang.String name
Name of team

Constructor Detail

Team

public Team(java.lang.String name,
            Map map,
            int x,
            int y)
Constructor for Team class

Parameters:
String - name of the team
Map - instance of the gameboard
int - x location of the team flag
int - y location of the team flag
Method Detail

act

public void act()
Generates genPoints. Calls doStuff.

build

public final void build(Piece piece)
Builds a new Piece at the location of Team.flag Also expends genPoints.

Parameters:
Piece - instance of Piece to be added to map.

displayMemory

public void displayMemory()
Print out current contents of Team.memory to terminal.

doStuff

public abstract void doStuff()
Controls incrementation and usage of genPoints. Overridden in concrete classes to control how the team uses genPoints.

generate

public abstract void generate()
Called by constructor. Sets up initial Pieces and values in Team.memory array.

getBonus

public void getBonus(Bonus b)
Called by instances of Piece that have intersected with instances of Bonus. Increments genPoints by the value of the Bonus instance.

getColor

public java.awt.Color getColor()
Gets team color. java.awt.Color

getFlag

public Flag getFlag()
Gets instance of Flag for this team

getGenPoints

public int getGenPoints()
Gets current value of genPoints.

receiveData

public void receiveData(int index,
                        int data)
Called by instances of Piece store new data in Team.memory array.

Parameters:
int - index of data to replace
int - data to be placed in Team.memory

sendData

public int sendData(int index)
Called by instances of Piece to retrieve data from Team.memory array.

Parameters:
int - index of data to send
